items.name: reservationFor
items.desc: The restaurant or other food establishment hosting the reservation.

items.name: reservationId
items.desc: A unique identifier for the reservation, consistent in all markup.

items.name: startTime
items.desc: The beginning date and time for the reservation.

items.name: underName
items.desc: The name of the person associated with the reservation, usually someone who will be dining.

items.name: url
items.desc: A webpage the user can access to view reservation details.
